name: izanai
author: Dream Seeker Lab Unlimited.

sections.description: This plugin gives your site some functions for web-marketing, for example, making invitations on Facebook, and so on.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place <?php do_action('plugin_name_hook'); ?> in your templates

description: This plugin gives your site some functions for web-marketing, for example, making invitations on Facebook, and so on.

upgrade_notice.1.1.0: New version Izanai makes it possible to control the design of Facebook-Login-Button. In particular, you can control... -- font-size of the message on the button -- margin of the button -- corner-roundness of the button -- shadow size of the button -- font-color in mouse-off, mouse-over and mouse-click -- button-color in mouse-off, mouse-over and mouse-click
upgrade_notice.1.1.1: By using short-code [izanai-button-fb], new version Izanai makes it possible to set the Facebook-Login-Button anywhere in your page or post.
upgrade_notice.1.1.2: New version Izanai makes it possible to decide whether you get facebook-user's birthday and location or not. You can decide whether or not on "izanai-settings".
upgrade_notice.1.1.3: New version Izanai's comment of plugin-manager in dashboard is updated for internationalization.
